title: Northern Liberties Stylish 1 bedroom
description:
1 bedroom/1 bath for rent
Stylish huge bedroom. Lots of natural light. Ample comfortable living space.
Comes *NEWLY* furnished including: Bed, 2 nightstands, 2 lamps, Fluffy Bedroom Rug, Wardrobe, Desk, Desk Chair, Couch, Lamps, Living Room Rug, TV, TV Stand, Kitchen Cart, Microwave, Kitchen utensils, cookware, glasses and mugs.
*everything you could need*
*save yourself hundreds if not thousands of dollars and the headache of furnishing a place*
You could easily move in with just your belongings. Ideal for students or those working from home or new to town. If you're a student coming to town for only a few years, save yourself the hassle and rent this place furnished. Personally, when I moved in and out as a student it became a huge hassle dealing with getting furniture in and out. I've been in this unit for a year and I am just moving away.
The neighborhood is super safe, with cafes, bars, clubs, grocery, restaurants, gyms all within walking distance. Easily walkable to Fishtown. Quiet area with lots of parking (I have never had an issue finding a spot). Its a quick walk to N 2nd street but also way quieter (you get the best of both worlds).
Temple Drexel UPenn WFH Work From Home Student Medical Dental Law Young Professional

title: Large 2 Bed & 2 Bath Apartment, Outdoor Space, Washer & Dryer, Parking
description:
Large two-bedroom, two-full-bath apartment. The apartment is located on a quiet street. There is a shared courtyard that nobody uses so it feels like your own space. You can put patio furniture, a grill, or a firepit in the courtyard if you'd like. You can also use other tenants' furniture. There is an access code to get in so packages can be delivered safely inside. Only three other apartments have access to the mail area so you shouldn’t have any issues.
It's located in a convenient spot so it's only a few blocks to Mom's Organics, Target, and CVS. It's also one block away from two bus lines that make a trip to the South Street Whole Foods or Acme convenient.
I'm looking for someone to take over my lease. I'm moving before the required 60-day notice is up. Therefore, I need to find someone to take it over. You could sign a new lease or take my lease over.
Main Bedroom Specifics
Extra-large main bedroom that can comfortably fit a king bed and other furniture.
Ensuite full bathroom.
Has an alcove that you can use as an office, storage space, or additional closet.
Wood floors.
3 large windows with a lot of light. The windows face the courtyard so it’s quiet. It’s so quiet that at night you could sleep with the windows open and not be disturbed.
Normal size closet with shelf and double doors
Second Bedroom Specifics
Large bedroom that can comfortably fit a king or queen bed and other furniture.
Wood floors
Normal size closet with shelf and double doors
Large windows with a lot of light. The windows face the courtyard so it’s quiet. It’s so quiet that at night you could sleep with the windows open and not be disturbed.
Apartment Specifics
Shared large courtyard. Not that many people use it so it feels like your own private space.
Washer and dryer in the unit.
Dishwasher
Garbage Disposal
2 Tub/shower combo
Central Air
Forced Heat
Flooring is tile and hardwood throughout the apartment, no carpet
There is a full-time maintenance person for the building so things get taken care of in a timely manner.
Rent is due on the 15th. You’re more than welcome to move in mid-November - December 17th.
Cats and dogs are welcome.
use Comcast or Verizon internet.
pass a background check and credit check. They have multiple buildings that they rent so they are use to students, cosigners, etc.
Expenses
Rent $1,810
Water - around $42
Electric - between $60-140 depending on the season
If this sounds like a good fit, please let me know the dates you are looking to move and we can setup a time for you to come view it.

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

title: Great value in Fairmount! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount
description:
Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. Inside the unit, you're greeted by a bright and open living room and dining area with soaring 9ft ceilings, tall windows, and beautiful hardwood floors. There's also a huge storage closet and a powder room. The home's kitchen is fitted with tons of cabinetry space, stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and the in-unit laundry closet. The home's second level has a spacious bedroom, with great closet space, at the front. A full bathroom and another bedroom, ideal for an office or nursery, complete this level. 1707 Wallace St's central Fairmount location is a walker's paradise, earning a WalkScore of 92. The Philadelphia Museum of Art, Kelly Drive, and The Community College of Philadelphia are all within walking distance. Nearby Fairmount Ave and North Broad Street are lined with local shops, gyms, and restaurants, including Bar Hygge, Rybread cafe, SOUTH, and Osteria. Whole Foods, Target, and Wine & Spirits are also close by. Plus, there's easy access to public transportation, I-76, Drexel University, and The University of Penn. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
1707 Wallace St #2R

title: Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista
description:
Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista in the much sought after Meredith catchment this 2 bedroom home is snuggled inside a private gated courtyard directly across from the neighborhood favorite Cianfrani Park. As you enter into the spacious living area accented by beautiful hardwood flooring and the first of two fireplaces you're enveloped with the warm feeling of love that has filled this home. Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.
725-727 Pemberton St #6

This spacious bi-level apartment checks all of the boxes... hardwood floors, central heat/AC, gas cooking, dishwasher, in-unit laundry, outdoor space, and an incredible location! In fact, this location has a Walk Score of 98, surrounded by some of the city's best coffee shops/brunch spots (Shot Tower Coffee, Fitzwater Cafe, etc) and neighborhood favorites new and old such as Fitz on 4th, Saloon Restaurant, & Little Fish. Inside the apartment you'll enjoy the top two floors (2nd/3rd) of the building, so no one living above you. The massive living room with exposed brick walls, 1/2 bathroom, laundry, and kitchen/dining area are all located on the 2nd floor. Off of the kitchen/dining room you can enjoy the first of two decks, convenient for grilling and outdoor dining. On the top floor there is a full bathroom and 3 spacious bedrooms, all with full closets. The rear bedroom also has a sliding door which leads out to your 2nd private deck. Property is vacant and can be scheduled on short notice!
762 S 5th St

title: 1 Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Near Coffee Shops
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 414 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 4th floor features large windows that mainly face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view of Chancellor Street including the loading dock. One window in the bedroom area faces south and has a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Bella Turka, Tselaine, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, and Theory. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Nail Spa Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Bottega Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, and Veda. Savor a cup of coffee at Elixr, La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Bluestone Lane, Di Bruno Bros, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:

* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Wood floors
* Large mainly east-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One south-facing window with Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 414 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! title: Freshly painted 3 bed, 1.5 bath house Available 11/1!
description: Welcome to this lovingly restored Roxborough-Manayunk charmer with so much original detail! This freshly painted 3 bed, 1.5 bath has a cozy front porch, original hardwood floors throughout, a spacious back patio (perfect for a hot tub!), and plenty of space for all your knick-knacks. Enter through the front porch to the ornate vestibule with original doors, and don’t forget to ring the restored doorbell! The home has security cameras already installed, which can be activated by the new tenant. The open floor plan on the entry level features original moulding, original hardwood floors, generously sized windows, and a Nest thermostat. The kitchen has plenty of storage, stained glass cabinetry, a gas range, dishwasher, and more oversized windows to bring in an abundance of natural light. Behind the kitchen is the laundry room and half bath, with the cutest sink you’ve ever seen. Past the laundry room is the back patio, which backs up to a classic Manayunk hill of trees and Wissahickon schist, providing privacy and a little slice of nature. Sitting on an 17’x83’ lot, the two outdoor spaces offer so much room for outside gatherings, plants, whatever your heart desires. title: Renovated 1 BR Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Guest Suites, Sauna
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Philadelphia Runner, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, and Di Bruno Bros. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Sauna
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!

201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

2-22 month lease terms available!
